problem_text:
5.7. H¨older regularity of capacitary potential of n-dimensional cube
It can be easily proved by a barrier argument that the harmonic capacitary
potential of the cube {x : 0 ≤ x_i ≤ 1, i = 1, . . . , n} belongs to a certain
H¨older class C^{α(n)}, 0 < α(n) < 1, which gives rise to the following
Problem. Describe the asymptotic behaviour of α(n) as n → ∞.
